verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

דַּבֵּ֞ר <S%H1696><s%> Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֵאמֹר֒ <S%H559><s%> saying נֶ֗פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> If a soul כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If תֶחֱטָ֤א <S%H2398><s%> shall sin בִשְׁגָגָה֙ <S%H7684><s%> through ignorance מִכֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> any מִצְוֹ֣ת <S%H4687><s%> against any of the commandments יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תֵעָשֶׂ֑ינָה <S%H6213><s%> [concerning things] which ought not to be done וְעָשָׂ֕ה <S%H6213><s%> and shall do מֵאַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> against any מֵהֵֽנָּה׃ <S%H2007><s%> of them

אִ֣ם <S%H518><s%> if הַכֹּהֵ֧ן <S%H3548><s%> If the priest הַמָּשִׁ֛יחַ <S%H4899><s%> that is anointed יֶחֱטָ֖א <S%H2398><s%> do sin לְאַשְׁמַ֣ת <S%H819><s%> according to the sin הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people וְהִקְרִ֡יב <S%H7126><s%> then let him bring עַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> as חַטָּאתוֹ֩ <S%H2403><s%> for his sin אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> he חָטָ֜א <S%H2398><s%> which he hath sinned פַּ֣ר <S%H6499><s%> bullock בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> afflicted בָּקָ֥ר <S%H1241><s%> bull תָּמִ֛ים <S%H8549><s%> without blemish לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD לְחַטָּֽאת׃ <S%H2403><s%> for a sin offering

וְהֵבִ֣יא <S%H935><s%> And he shall bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַפָּ֗ר <S%H6499><s%> the bullock אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פֶּ֛תַח <S%H6607><s%> unto the door אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֖ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְסָמַ֤ךְ <S%H5564><s%> and shall lay אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָדוֹ֙ <S%H3027><s%> his hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> head הַפָּ֔ר <S%H6499><s%> upon the bullock's וְשָׁחַ֥ט <S%H7819><s%> and kill אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַפָּ֖ר <S%H6499><s%> the bullock לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וְלָקַ֛ח <S%H3947><s%> shall take הַכֹּהֵ֥ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest הַמָּשִׁ֖יחַ <S%H4899><s%> that is anointed מִדַּ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> blood הַפָּ֑ר <S%H6499><s%> of the bullock's וְהֵבִ֥יא <S%H935><s%> and bring אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> it to the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation

וְטָבַ֧ל <S%H2881><s%> shall dip הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶצְבָּע֖וֹ <S%H676><s%> his finger בַּדָּ֑ם <S%H1818><s%> in the blood וְהִזָּ֨ה <S%H5137><s%> and sprinkle מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> some הַדָּ֜ם <S%H1818><s%> of the blood שֶׁ֤בַע <S%H7651><s%> seven פְּעָמִים֙ <S%H6471><s%> times לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before פָּרֹ֥כֶת <S%H6532><s%> the vail הַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <S%H6944><s%> of the sanctuary

וְנָתַן֩ <S%H5414><s%> shall put הַכֹּהֵ֨ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> some הַדָּ֜ם <S%H1818><s%> [some] of the blood עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on קַ֠רְנוֹת <S%H7161><s%> upon the horns מִזְבַּ֨ח <S%H4196><s%> of the altar קְטֹ֤רֶת <S%H7004><s%> incense הַסַּמִּים֙ <S%H5561><s%> of sweet לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּאֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> which [is] in the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all דַּ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> all the blood הַפָּ֗ר <S%H6499><s%> of the bullock יִשְׁפֹּךְ֙ <S%H8210><s%> and shall pour אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at יְסוֹד֙ <S%H3247><s%> at the bottom מִזְבַּ֣ח <S%H4196><s%> of the altar הָעֹלָ֔ה <S%H5930><s%> of the burnt offering אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which פֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> which [is at] the door אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חֵ֛לֶב <S%H2459><s%> from it all the fat פַּ֥ר <S%H6499><s%> of the bullock הַֽחַטָּ֖את <S%H2403><s%> for the sin offering יָרִ֣ים <S%H7311><s%> And he shall take off מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֵ֙לֶב֙ <S%H2459><s%> the fat הַֽמְכַסֶּ֣ה <S%H3680><s%> that covereth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַקֶּ֔רֶב <S%H7130><s%> the inwards וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַחֵ֔לֶב <S%H2459><s%> and all the fat אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is on הַקֶּֽרֶב׃ <S%H7130><s%> that [is] upon the inwards

וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> שְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> And the two הַכְּלָיֹ֔ת <S%H3629><s%> kidneys וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֵ֙לֶב֙ <S%H2459><s%> and the fat אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עֲלֵיהֶ֔ן <S%H5921><s%> and אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is on הַכְּסָלִ֑ים <S%H3689><s%> that [is] upon them which [is] by the flanks וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיֹּתֶ֙רֶת֙ <S%H3508><s%> and the caul עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> of הַכָּבֵ֔ד <S%H3516><s%> above the liver עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> with הַכְּלָי֖וֹת <S%H3629><s%> with the kidneys יְסִירֶֽנָּה׃ <S%H5493><s%> it shall he take away

כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> it יוּרַ֔ם <S%H7311><s%> As it was taken off מִשּׁ֖וֹר <S%H7794><s%> from the bullock זֶ֣בַח <S%H2077><s%> of the sacrifice הַשְּׁלָמִ֑ים <S%H8002><s%> of peace offerings וְהִקְטִירָם֙ <S%H6999><s%> shall burn הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> and the priest עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> on מִזְבַּ֥ח <S%H4196><s%> them upon the altar הָעֹלָֽה׃ <S%H5930><s%> of the burnt offering

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ע֤וֹר <S%H5785><s%> And the skin הַפָּר֙ <S%H6499><s%> of the bullock וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all בְּשָׂר֔וֹ <S%H1320><s%> and all his flesh עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> with רֹאשׁ֖וֹ <S%H7218><s%> with his head וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and its כְּרָעָ֑יו <S%H3767><s%> and with his legs וְקִרְבּ֖וֹ <S%H7130><s%> and his inwards וּפִרְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H6569><s%> and his dung

וְהוֹצִ֣יא <S%H3318><s%> shall he carry forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> is all הַ֠פָּר <S%H6499><s%> Even the whole bullock אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> where מִח֨וּץ <S%H2351><s%> without לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֜ה <S%H4264><s%> the camp אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> where מָק֤וֹם <S%H4725><s%> place טָהוֹר֙ <S%H2889><s%> unto a clean אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> where שֶׁ֣פֶךְ <S%H8211><s%> are poured out הַדֶּ֔שֶׁן <S%H1880><s%> where the ashes וְשָׂרַ֥ף <S%H8313><s%> and burn אֹת֛וֹ <S%H853><s%> עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> where עֵצִ֖ים <S%H6086><s%> him on the wood בָּאֵ֑שׁ <S%H784><s%> with fire עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> where שֶׁ֥פֶךְ <S%H8211><s%> are poured out הַדֶּ֖שֶׁן <S%H1880><s%> the ashes יִשָּׂרֵֽף׃ <S%H8313><s%> shall he be burnt פ

וְאִ֨ם <S%H518><s%> now if כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole עֲדַ֤ת <S%H5712><s%> And if the whole congregation יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel יִשְׁגּ֔וּ <S%H7686><s%> sin through ignorance וְנֶעְלַ֣ם <S%H5956><s%> be hid דָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> and the thing מֵעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> from the eyes הַקָּהָ֑ל <S%H6951><s%> of the assembly וְ֠עָשׂוּ <S%H6213><s%> and they have done אַחַ֨ת <S%H259><s%> [somewhat against] any מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole מִצְוֹ֧ת <S%H4687><s%> of the commandments יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תֵעָשֶׂ֖ינָה <S%H6213><s%> [concerning things] which should not be done וְאָשֵֽׁמוּ׃ <S%H816><s%> and are guilty

וְנֽוֹדְעָה֙ <S%H3045><s%> against it is known הַֽחַטָּ֔את <S%H2403><s%> When the sin אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which חָטְא֖וּ <S%H2398><s%> which they have sinned עָלֶ֑יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and וְהִקְרִ֨יבוּ <S%H7126><s%> shall offer הַקָּהָ֜ל <S%H6951><s%> then the congregation פַּ֤ר <S%H6499><s%> bullock בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> afflicted בָּקָר֙ <S%H1241><s%> of the herd לְחַטָּ֔את <S%H2403><s%> for the sin וְהֵבִ֣יאוּ <S%H935><s%> and bring אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> him before אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation

וְ֠סָמְכוּ <S%H5564><s%> shall lay זִקְנֵ֨י <S%H2205><s%> And the elders הָעֵדָ֧ה <S%H5712><s%> of the congregation אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְדֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H3027><s%> their hands עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> upon the head הַפָּ֖ר <S%H6499><s%> of the bullock לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְשָׁחַ֥ט <S%H7819><s%> shall be killed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַפָּ֖ר <S%H6499><s%> and the bullock לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וְהֵבִ֛יא <S%H935><s%> shall bring הַכֹּהֵ֥ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest הַמָּשִׁ֖יחַ <S%H4899><s%> that is anointed מִדַּ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> blood הַפָּ֑ר <S%H6499><s%> of the bullock's אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֹ֖הֶל <S%H168><s%> to the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation

וְטָבַ֧ל <S%H2881><s%> shall dip הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest אֶצְבָּע֖וֹ <S%H676><s%> his finger מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> in הַדָּ֑ם <S%H1818><s%> [in some] of the blood וְהִזָּ֞ה <S%H5137><s%> and sprinkle שֶׁ֤בַע <S%H7651><s%> [it] seven פְּעָמִים֙ <S%H6471><s%> times לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> [even] before הַפָּרֹֽכֶת׃ <S%H6532><s%> the vail

וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> some הַדָּ֞ם <S%H1818><s%> [some] of the blood יִתֵּ֣ן ׀ <S%H5414><s%> And he shall put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on קַרְנֹ֣ת <S%H7161><s%> upon the horns הַמִּזְבֵּ֗חַ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> which [is] before יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּאֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> that [is] in the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation וְאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַדָּ֗ם <S%H1818><s%> all the blood יִשְׁפֹּךְ֙ <S%H8210><s%> and shall pour out אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at יְסוֹד֙ <S%H3247><s%> at the bottom מִזְבַּ֣ח <S%H4196><s%> of the altar הָעֹלָ֔ה <S%H5930><s%> of the burnt offering אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which פֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> which [is at] the door אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation

וְאֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חֶלְבּ֖וֹ <S%H2459><s%> all his fat יָרִ֣ים <S%H7311><s%> And he shall take מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at וְהִקְטִ֖יר <S%H6999><s%> from him and burn הַמִּזְבֵּֽחָה׃ <S%H4196><s%> [it] upon the altar

וְעָשָׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> And he shall do לַפָּ֔ר <S%H6499><s%> with the bullock כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> he עָשָׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> as he did לְפַ֣ר <S%H6499><s%> with the bullock הַֽחַטָּ֔את <S%H2403><s%> for a sin offering כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> thus יַעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> so shall he do לּ֑וֹ וְכִפֶּ֧ר <S%H3722><s%> shall make an atonement עֲלֵהֶ֛ם <S%H5921><s%> with הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> with this and the priest וְנִסְלַ֥ח <S%H5545><s%> for them and it shall be forgiven לָהֶֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> like

וְהוֹצִ֣יא <S%H3318><s%> And he shall carry forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַפָּ֗ר <S%H6499><s%> the bullock אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מִחוּץ֙ <S%H2351><s%> without לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <S%H4264><s%> the camp וְשָׂרַ֣ף <S%H8313><s%> and burn אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> it שָׂרַ֔ף <S%H8313><s%> him as he burned אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> הַפָּ֣ר <S%H6499><s%> bullock הָרִאשׁ֑וֹן <S%H7223><s%> the first חַטַּ֥את <S%H2403><s%> it [is] a sin offering הַקָּהָ֖ל <S%H6951><s%> for the congregation הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he פ

אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> When נָשִׂ֖יא <S%H5387><s%> When a ruler יֶֽחֱטָ֑א <S%H2398><s%> hath sinned וְעָשָׂ֡ה <S%H6213><s%> and done אַחַ֣ת <S%H259><s%> [against] any מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all מִצְוֹת֩ <S%H4687><s%> of the commandments יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהָ֜יו <S%H430><s%> his God אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תֵעָשֶׂ֛ינָה <S%H6213><s%> [concerning things] which should not be done בִּשְׁגָגָ֖ה <S%H7684><s%> [somewhat] through ignorance וְאָשֵֽׁם׃ <S%H816><s%> and is guilty

אֽוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> if הוֹדַ֤ע <S%H3045><s%> come to his knowledge אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> about חַטָּאת֔וֹ <S%H2403><s%> Or if his sin אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which חָטָ֖א <S%H2398><s%> wherein he hath sinned בָּ֑הּ וְהֵבִ֧יא <S%H935><s%> he shall bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קָרְבָּנ֛וֹ <S%H7133><s%> his offering שְׂעִ֥יר <S%H8163><s%> a kid עִזִּ֖ים <S%H5795><s%> of the goats זָכָ֥ר <S%H2145><s%> a male תָּמִֽים׃ <S%H8549><s%> without blemish

וְסָמַ֤ךְ <S%H5564><s%> And he shall lay יָדוֹ֙ <S%H3027><s%> his hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> upon the head הַשָּׂעִ֔יר <S%H8163><s%> of the goat וְשָׁחַ֣ט <S%H7819><s%> and kill אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> בִּמְק֛וֹם <S%H4725><s%> it in the place אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> where יִשְׁחַ֥ט <S%H7819><s%> where they kill אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> the burnt offering לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD חַטָּ֖את <S%H2403><s%> it [is] a sin offering הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וְלָקַ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> shall take הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest מִדַּ֤ם <S%H1818><s%> of the blood הַֽחַטָּאת֙ <S%H2403><s%> of the sin offering בְּאֶצְבָּע֔וֹ <S%H676><s%> with his finger וְנָתַ֕ן <S%H5414><s%> and put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on קַרְנֹ֖ת <S%H7161><s%> [it] upon the horns מִזְבַּ֣ח <S%H4196><s%> of the altar הָעֹלָ֑ה <S%H5930><s%> of burnt offering וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּמ֣וֹ <S%H1818><s%> his blood יִשְׁפֹּ֔ךְ <S%H8210><s%> and shall pour out אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at יְס֖וֹד <S%H3247><s%> at the bottom מִזְבַּ֥ח <S%H4196><s%> of the altar הָעֹלָֽה׃ <S%H5930><s%> of burnt offering

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All חֶלְבּוֹ֙ <S%H2459><s%> all his fat יַקְטִ֣יר <S%H6999><s%> And he shall burn הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חָה <S%H4196><s%> upon the altar כְּחֵ֖לֶב <S%H2459><s%> as the fat זֶ֣בַח <S%H2077><s%> of the sacrifice הַשְּׁלָמִ֑ים <S%H8002><s%> of peace offerings וְכִפֶּ֨ר <S%H3722><s%> shall make an atonement עָלָ֧יו <S%H5921><s%> and הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <S%H3548><s%> and the priest מֵחַטָּאת֖וֹ <S%H2403><s%> for him as concerning his sin וְנִסְלַ֥ח <S%H5545><s%> and it shall be forgiven לֽוֹ׃ פ

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> now if נֶ֧פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> one אַחַ֛ת <S%H259><s%> And if any תֶּחֱטָ֥א <S%H2398><s%> sin בִשְׁגָגָ֖ה <S%H7684><s%> through ignorance מֵעַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> people הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the common בַּ֠עֲשֹׂתָהּ <S%H6213><s%> while he doeth אַחַ֨ת <S%H259><s%> [somewhat against] any מִמִּצְוֹ֧ת <S%H4687><s%> of the commandments יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תֵעָשֶׂ֖ינָה <S%H6213><s%> [concerning things] which ought not to be done וְאָשֵֽׁם׃ <S%H816><s%> and be guilty

א֚וֹ <S%H176><s%> if הוֹדַ֣ע <S%H3045><s%> come to his knowledge אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> about חַטָּאת֖וֹ <S%H2403><s%> Or if his sin אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which חָטָ֑א <S%H2398><s%> which he hath sinned וְהֵבִ֨יא <S%H935><s%> then he shall bring קָרְבָּנ֜וֹ <S%H7133><s%> his offering שְׂעִירַ֤ת <S%H8166><s%> a kid עִזִּים֙ <S%H5795><s%> of the goats תְּמִימָ֣ה <S%H8549><s%> without blemish נְקֵבָ֔ה <S%H5347><s%> a female עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for חַטָּאת֖וֹ <S%H2403><s%> for his sin אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which חָטָֽא׃ <S%H2398><s%> which he hath sinned

וְסָמַךְ֙ <S%H5564><s%> And he shall lay אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָד֔וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> on רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> upon the head הַֽחַטָּ֑את <S%H2403><s%> of the sin offering וְשָׁחַט֙ <S%H7819><s%> and slay אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַ֣חַטָּ֔את <S%H2403><s%> the sin offering בִּמְק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> in the place הָעֹלָֽה׃ <S%H5930><s%> of the burnt offering

וְלָקַ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> shall take הַכֹּהֵ֤ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest מִדָּמָהּ֙ <S%H1818><s%> of the blood בְּאֶצְבָּע֔וֹ <S%H676><s%> thereof with his finger וְנָתַ֕ן <S%H5414><s%> and put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on קַרְנֹ֖ת <S%H7161><s%> [it] upon the horns מִזְבַּ֣ח <S%H4196><s%> of the altar הָעֹלָ֑ה <S%H5930><s%> of burnt offering וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all דָּמָ֣הּ <S%H1818><s%> all the blood יִשְׁפֹּ֔ךְ <S%H8210><s%> and shall pour out אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at יְס֖וֹד <S%H3247><s%> thereof at the bottom הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חֶלְבָּ֣הּ <S%H2459><s%> all the fat יָסִ֗יר <S%H5493><s%> And he shall take away כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after הוּסַ֣ר <S%H5493><s%> is taken away חֵלֶב֮ <S%H2459><s%> thereof as the fat מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> from זֶ֣בַח <S%H2077><s%> from off the sacrifice הַשְּׁלָמִים֒ <S%H8002><s%> of peace offerings וְהִקְטִ֤יר <S%H6999><s%> shall burn הַכֹּהֵן֙ <S%H3548><s%> and the priest הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חָה <S%H4196><s%> [it] upon the altar לְרֵ֥יחַ <S%H7381><s%> savour נִיחֹ֖חַ <S%H5207><s%> for a sweet לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וְכִפֶּ֥ר <S%H3722><s%> shall make an atonement עָלָ֛יו <S%H5921><s%> and הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> and the priest וְנִסְלַ֥ח <S%H5545><s%> for him and it shall be forgiven לֽוֹ׃ פ

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if כֶּ֛בֶשׂ <S%H3532><s%> a lamb יָבִ֥יא <S%H935><s%> And if he bring קָרְבָּנ֖וֹ <S%H7133><s%> offering לְחַטָּ֑את <S%H2403><s%> for a sin נְקֵבָ֥ה <S%H5347><s%> it a female תְמִימָ֖ה <S%H8549><s%> without blemish יְבִיאֶֽנָּה׃ <S%H935><s%> he shall bring

וְלָקַ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> shall take הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest מִדַּ֤ם <S%H1818><s%> of the blood הַֽחַטָּאת֙ <S%H2403><s%> of the sin offering בְּאֶצְבָּע֔וֹ <S%H676><s%> with his finger וְנָתַ֕ן <S%H5414><s%> and put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on קַרְנֹ֖ת <S%H7161><s%> [it] upon the horns מִזְבַּ֣ח <S%H4196><s%> of the altar הָעֹלָ֑ה <S%H5930><s%> of burnt offering וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all דָּמָ֣הּ <S%H1818><s%> all the blood יִשְׁפֹּ֔ךְ <S%H8210><s%> and shall pour out אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at יְס֖וֹד <S%H3247><s%> thereof at the bottom הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חֶלְבָּ֣ה <S%H2459><s%> all the fat יָסִ֗יר <S%H5493><s%> And he shall take away כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which יוּסַ֥ר <S%H5493><s%> is taken away חֵֽלֶב־ <S%H2459><s%> thereof as the fat הַכֶּשֶׂב֮ <S%H3775><s%> of the lamb מִזֶּ֣בַח <S%H2077><s%> from the sacrifice הַשְּׁלָמִים֒ <S%H8002><s%> of the peace offerings וְהִקְטִ֨יר <S%H6999><s%> shall burn הַכֹּהֵ֤ן <S%H3548><s%> and the priest אֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חָה <S%H4196><s%> them upon the altar עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> regard אִשֵּׁ֣י <S%H801><s%> according to the offerings made by fire יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וְכִפֶּ֨ר <S%H3722><s%> shall make an atonement עָלָ֧יו <S%H5921><s%> regard הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <S%H3548><s%> and the priest עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> regard חַטָּאת֥וֹ <S%H2403><s%> for his sin אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which חָטָ֖א <S%H2398><s%> that he hath committed וְנִסְלַ֥ח <S%H5545><s%> and it shall be forgiven לֽוֹ׃ פ
